welcome.title: Are you sure you want to take this quiz?
welcome.description: Some people may go to cook waffles after this quiz

first.text: You woke up at 6:00 AM, what is the first thing you will do?

second.text: With that in mind, you decided to close your eyes for:

third.text: Suddenly you hear a sound from your kitchen, you opened eyes. What will you take with you?

fourth.text: You open a door and see a waffle with a spoon, what do you do?

buttons.first: Stay calm, and ask him if he wants to be eaten
buttons.second: point your weapon at him, and start screaming
buttons.third: I am dreaming? This can't be possible

fifth.text: A waffle ask you politly to help him, shall we?

buttons.first: Yes! We even can become a friends later!!
buttons.second: Yes, at the end I will eat his!
buttons.third: I'm curious what will happen next...

sixth.text: A Waffle shows you the ingerients for cooking, but you don't know how to cook, what do you do ?

buttons.second: I think I can figure out, and if not, I will eat him
buttons.third: Uhhm.. not sure, but I will try my best!

seventh.text: Almost done! All you need is to put one of the ingredients, what it should be?

eight.text: Done! You show to him your perfect home-made waffle, and he seems to be happy!

buttons.first: Ask him if he want to be your friend?
buttons.second: leave him and move on with your life
buttons.third: Eat him and your home-made waffle!

ninth.text: Suddenly your vision goes dark and you fall to the floor. You open your eyes and see the old familiar ceiling

buttons.second: It was a dream? I now want to go to cook some waffles!
